ingredients.ingredient: 1 slice Cheddar cheese, or to taste

cookingTips: Layer ham and cheese on naan before heating for even melting
Heat on griddle or skillet over medium heat for 2-3 minutes until cheese melts
Fold naan in half or cut into pieces for easy serving as a sandwich
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simple ham and cheese naan sandwich. Would you prefer a crispy exterior or soft texture? Do you want suggestions for additional toppings or serving accompaniments?
